name: RETROSPECT (Boats)
description:
Retrospect was created in 7 days for Brackey's 2020.1 Jam 

Navigate through puzzles ranging from easy to extremely challenging. Undo mistakes and try new strategies with ease.

This project was made entirely from scratch aside from the stuff listed below. (Neither of us do audio stuff very well).

Created By

Andrew Seward - @_aseward - Programming / World Design 

Madeleine Spangler - 3d Models

PAID ASSETS

Amplify LUT Pack
